categories: Category:Starships of the Order of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: The Mystic was the personal Infiltrator-series long-range fighter of Darth Bane. He acquired it through one of his various contacts. The ship was a medium-sized starfighter. It had light weapons and minimal plating, to focus on speed and maneuverability. The ship had a Class Four hyperdrive, and could hold up to six passengers.
